column2: BRIEF-Piedmont Office Realty Trust Reports Q1 EPS $0.42 May 1 (Reuters) - Piedmont Office Realty Trust Inc: * REG-PIEDMONT OFFICE REALTY TRUST REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS AND RAISES 2018 GUIDANCE * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.69 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
